designs.name: Floral Print Maxi Dress
designs.description: Beautiful floral print maxi dress with flowing silhouette.

designs.name: Elegant Olive Green Dress
designs.description: Vibrant olive green A-line frock with mandarin collar and V-neck opening, featuring golden and black striped placket running down the front and matching striped cuffs on elbow-length sleeves for a traditional yet elegant look.

designs.name: Pink Kurti
designs.description: Dusty rose mauve colored kurta set with matching straight-cut pants and dupatta, featuring intricate white and golden geometric and floral embroidery on neckline, chest, cuffs, and hemline, with scattered metallic foil print dots throughout.
designs.work: White and Golden Embroidery, Metallic Foil Print

designs.name: Elegant Evening Dress
designs.description: Vibrant deep fuchsia or magenta colored dress with elegant off-the-shoulder wide V-neckline featuring pleated draped design across bust, fabric flower appliqué with white pearl center on bodice, fitted waistline, and A-line flared skirt with subtle sheen and textured finish.
designs.work: Pleated Draping, Fabric Flower Appliqué with Pearl

designs.name: Bridal Lehenga Set
designs.description: Stunning bridal lehenga with heavy embroidery and mirror work.
designs.work: Heavy Zari Work, Mirror Work, Stone Work

designs.name: Casual Summer Frock
designs.description: Comfortable and stylish short frock perfect for summer.

designs.name: Casual Summer Frock
designs.description: Comfortable and stylish short frock perfect for summer.

designs.name: Casual Summer Frock
designs.description: Comfortable and stylish short frock perfect for summer.

designs.name: Light Sage Green Frock
designs.description: Light sage green A-line frock with sheer green embroidered overlay jacket featuring intricate floral and vine patterns, beaded details, sequins, mandarin collar, and long puffed sleeves with open-front design.

designs.name: Deep Crimson Red Frock
designs.description: Deep crimson red A-line frock with textured check pattern and sequin embellishments, paired with cream cropped vest featuring vibrant pink, red, and green floral embroidery, decorative tassels, and open-front design with tie closure.

designs.name: Elegant Floral Print Frock
designs.description: A vibrant fuchsia long frock crafted in lightweight georgette, featuring all-over digital floral print with a scalloped neckline, gathered skirt, and ruffled hem detailing for an elegant, flowy look.

designs.name: Blush Pink Long Frock
designs.description: A blush pink floral maxi frock with long sleeves, a softly gathered skirt, and an elegant back cut-out tied with delicate tasseled strings.

designs.name: Vibrant Pink V-neck Frock
designs.description: Vibrant fuchsia pink A-line long frock with V-neck featuring golden trim, scattered golden floral embroidery on bodice and long sleeves, deep U-shaped back with tie-up closure and decorative tassels, and flowing gathered skirt.

designs.name: Crimson Red Ball Gown
designs.description: Striking crimson red ball gown frock with off-the-shoulder sweetheart neckline, ruched cap sleeves, fitted bodice with pleating, and voluminous A-line layered skirt with ground-length hemline for a dramatic, elegant look.

designs.name: Princess Dress
designs.description: Adorable princess dress for special occasions.
